# Crafter's Fortune (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Component:** V, S, F (a tool)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 1 day/level or until discharged (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Advanced Player's Guide, pg 213

The target is struck by inspiration and gains a +5 luck bonus on its next [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] skill check.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Witch 1 to Level.

*House Rule:* This spell can target an *[[Unseen Crafter (Spell)|unseen crafter]]* (cf. *[[Unseen Crafter (Spell)|unseen crafter]]* spell)
